name: Hardy
description:
Walk to the ends of the earth with DMC's Hardy line of rugged all-terrain boots. Featuring increased ankle support and waterproof materials, you can trudge through desert or mountain in comfort.
Women's sizes currently out of stock.
description_cn:
穿着丹宁牛仔的耐寒全地形糙汉靴子,让你走到世界的尽头.具有增加脚踝的支撑和防水材料,让您可以舒适地在沙漠或山区跋涉.
女款目前缺货.
